verses.verse: A <S%H2415>shoot<s%> will come <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H1503>stock<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse,<s%> and a <S%H5342>branch<s%> out of his <S%H8328>roots<s%> will bear <S%H6509>fruit.<s%>

The <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5117>rest<s%> on <S%H7307>him:<s%> the spirit of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H2451>understanding,<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H6098>counsel<s%> and <S%H1369>might,<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> and of the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

His <S%H7306>delight<s%> will be in the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> He will not <S%H8199>judge<s%> by the <S%H4758>sight<s%> of his <S%H4758>eyes,<s%> neither <S%H3198>decide<s%> by the <S%H4926>hearing<s%> of his <S%H241>ears;<s%>

but with <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> he will <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H1800>poor,<s%> and <S%H3198>decide<s%> with <S%H4334>equity<s%> for the <S%H6035>humble<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%> He will <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> with the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> and with the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of his <S%H8193>lips<s%> he will <S%H4191>kill<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
<S%H6664>Righteousness<s%> will be the <S%H232>belt<s%> of his <S%H4975>waist,<s%> and <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> the <S%H232>belt<s%> of his <S%H2504>waist.<s%>

The <S%H2061>wolf<s%> will <S%H1481>live<s%> with the <S%H3532>lamb,<s%> and the <S%H5246>leopard<s%> will lie <S%H7257>down<s%> with the young <S%H1423>goat;<s%> The <S%H5695>calf,<s%> the young <S%H3715>lion,<s%> and the fattened <S%H5695>calf<s%> <S%H3162>together;<s%> and a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5288>child<s%> will lead <S%H5090>them.<s%>

The <S%H6510>cow<s%> and the <S%H1677>bear<s%> will <S%H7462>graze.<s%> Their young <S%H3206>ones<s%> will lie <S%H7257>down<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%> The <S%H738>lion<s%> will <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> like the <S%H1241>ox.<s%>

The nursing <S%H3243>child<s%> will <S%H8173>play<s%> near a <S%H6620>cobra<s%>'s <S%H2352>hole,<s%> and the weaned <S%H1580>child<s%> will <S%H1911>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H6848>viper<s%>'s <S%H3975>den.<s%>

They will not <S%H7489>hurt<s%> nor <S%H7843>destroy<s%> in all my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain;<s%> for the <S%H776>earth<s%> will be <S%H4390>full<s%> of the <S%H1844>knowledge<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> as the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

It will happen in that <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H8328>root<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse,<s%> who <S%H5975>stands<s%> as a <S%H5251>banner<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples;<s%> and his <S%H4496>resting<s%> place will be <S%H3519>glorious.<s%>

It will happen in that <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H136>Lord<s%> will <S%H3254>set<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> the second <S%H8145>time<s%> to <S%H7069>recover<s%> the <S%H7605>remnant<s%> that is <S%H7604>left<s%> of his <S%H5971>people<s%> from <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from <S%H6624>Pathros,<s%> from <S%H3568>Cush,<s%> from <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> from <S%H8152>Shinar,<s%> from <S%H2574>Hamath,<s%> and from the <S%H339>islands<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

He will set <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H5251>banner<s%> for the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and will <S%H622>assemble<s%> the <S%H1760>outcasts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and gather <S%H6908>together<s%> the <S%H5310>dispersed<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> from the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3671>corners<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

The <S%H7068>envy<s%> also of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> will <S%H5493>depart,<s%> and those who <S%H6887>persecute<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> will be cut <S%H3772>off.<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H7065>won't<s%> envy <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H6887>won't<s%> persecute <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%>

They will <S%H5774>fly<s%> down on the <S%H3802>shoulders<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> on the <S%H3220>west.<s%> <S%H3162>Together<s%> they will <S%H962>plunder<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H6924>east.<s%> They will <S%H4916>extend<s%> their <S%H3027>power<s%> over <S%H123>Edom<s%> and <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> will obey <S%H4928>them.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptian<s%> <S%H3220>sea;<s%> and with his <S%H5868>scorching<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> he will <S%H5130>wave<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> over the <S%H5104>River,<s%> and will <S%H5221>split<s%> it into <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5158>streams,<s%> and cause men to march <S%H1869>over<s%> in <S%H5275>sandals.<s%>

There will be a <S%H4546>highway<s%> for the <S%H7605>remnant<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H7604>left<s%> of his <S%H5971>people<s%> from <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> like there was for <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he came <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
